markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow's Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=2513) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 87 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your shadow assaults your foes. You can cast [_shadow blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=273) as a 5th-level occult innate spell once per day. At 17th level, your _shadow blast_ is heightened to 6th level.
name: Shadow's Assault
